g.text: Art of the Book of Life
Cartoon vision: UPA animation and postwar aesthetics
Forbidden animation: censored cartoons and blacklisted animators in America
Hollywood cartoons: American animation in its golden age
The Colored cartoon: Black representation in American animated short films, 1907-1954
The animated man: a life of Walt Disney
The art of Walt Disney: from Mickey Mouse to the Magic Kingdoms
Walt Disney: the triumph of the American imagination
Walt before Mickey: Disney's early years, 1919-1928
[Disney Podcast] Walt Disney Animation's Fantasia 2000 Review [DCast E38]
295 The Who's Who In The Animation Industry - Does Disney Really Own Everything?
